we are leaven brewing.
we grew this.
we are a husband and wife team who has taken everything we've had (and all of our sleep) to build a place where people can connect while drinking some dang delicious stuff.
at leaven brewing you are experiencing the absolute heart and soul of everything kj has ever worked for.
kj is a brewer, who's learned under some super unique circumstances, but he's also now the owner of a brewery.
brewhub, unlike fmb, was a 100bbl system (#nbd) and produced roughly around 98,000 barrels of beer a year.
kj quickly became the head brewer of fort myers, which went on to receive respectable awards at best florida beer, and collect accolades on ratebeer.
kj started at fort myers brewing co. and learned the process from rob, the owner there.
kj has brewing experience that is unlike most others.
however , the makeup of who is behind leaven brewing is what makes this place, our place (soon to be your place) a really neat, individual, independent of other projects kind of place.
it was pointed out to me the other night that what we're creating is something truly unique, and individual to us.
we are kj and jillian and we make beer!
